alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:45PM CDT until July 04 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT/730 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHWESTERN WICHITA AND SOUTHEASTERN GREELEY COUNTIES... At 544 PM MDT/644 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Leoti, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public reported quarter size hail northeast of Tribune. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tribune, Horace, Lydia and Selkirk. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
